summary: Analyzed 6 sorries across 3 Decidability files: 2 list lemmas in Closure.lean (medium), 1 termination lemma in Saturation.lean (hard), and 3 completeness theorems in Correctness.lean (very hard, requiring FMP integration). Recommended implementation order: Closure.lean first, then Saturation.lean, then Correctness.lean.

artifacts.summary: Detailed analysis of 6 sorries with proof strategies, required Mathlib lemmas, and difficulty assessments
